# Conjure Ice Beast II (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Creation Spells|creation]]) \[[[Cold Spells|cold]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[2nd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]], [[BoXM 3rd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** One or more conjured ice creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Frostburn (WotC), pg. 91

This spell functions like *[[Conjure Ice Beast I (Spell)|conjure ice beast I]]**,* except that you can conjure one creature from the 2nd-level list or two creatures of the same kind from the 1st-level list.
